content:
Hello all, just getting the ball rolling for the next subscription-related block vote (Jira Filter). Issues include:

  • FHIR#32753 : SubscriptionTopic should be a CanonicalResource (@Lloyd McKenzie)
  • FHIR#31946 : Declaring Conformance to Subscriptions (@Benjamin Langley)
  • FHIR#31458 : What does multi-resource mean? (@Isaac Vetter)
  • FHIR#31441 : Wrong element definition on "Additional Criteria" (@Bas van den Heuvel)
  • FHIR#31425 : Relation to R5 changes (@Bas van den Heuvel)
  • FHIR#31430 : Subscription criteria to use (@Bas van den Heuvel)
  • FHIR#30420 : Additional guidance text on websocket binding token usage (@Gino Canessa)
  • FHIR#30404 : Need examples for Subscription.notificationUrlLocation (@Gino Canessa)
  • FHIR#30383 : Need more clarification on filterBy operation on multiple resource triggers (@Nandha K)
  • FHIR#30381 : Subscription/$status operation should allow filtering by Subscription.status (@Jenni Syed)
  • FHIR#30379 : Clarify $status parameters (@Jenni Syed)

If anyone would like an issue pulled from the list, please let me know. Thanks!
@Gino Canessa Do you plan to vote this on Monday?
@Yunwei Wang If there's room on the agenda, could we also tee up FHIR#31451 and FHIR#30415 please? They were not included in the block vote, but I would like to get them resolved. Thanks again!
